task.summary: Resetting to working version of backbone crud in prep to test require.js

After way too many trials, a working version of requirejs, backbone.js with a templated page. Most errors were typo or case mismatch errors. Also LOTS of caching deadend problems fixed by restarts or emptying browser cache.
Cleaned up cruft code, removed plugins
Added bootstrap data and added commented H2 db config for those not wanting to set up a postresql db.
Committing merge of requirejs work back into master
